import React,{useState,useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useCart}from'../context/CartContext';import{useBooking}from'../context/BookingContext';import'./NavBar.css';import{motion,AnimatePresence}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Navbar(){const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const menuRef=useRef(null);const{cart}=useCart();const{bookings,tables}=useBooking();const cartCount=cart.length+bookings.length+tables.length;const toggleMenu=()=>setIsOpen(prev=>!prev);// Close menu when clicking outside
useEffect(()=>{const handleClickOutside=e=>{if(menuRef.current&&!menuRef.current.contains(e.target)){setIsOpen(false);}};document.addEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);return()=>document.removeEventListener('mousedown',handleClickOutside);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-logo",children:"Raj Restaurant \uD83D\uDECE\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hamburger",onClick:toggleMenu,children:"\u2630"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnimatePresence,{children:isOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.ul,{className:"dropdown-menu",ref:menuRef,initial:{opacity:0,y:-10},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},exit:{opacity:0,y:-10},transition:{duration:0.3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"close-icon",onClick:toggleMenu,children:"\u2716"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/book-table",onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Book Table"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/book-room",onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Book Room"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/order-food",onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Order Food"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/cart",onClick:toggleMenu,children:["Cart (",cartCount,")"]})})]})})]});}
